source.name: Lab 2.1:  Exploring the Actions Folder - purpose of init file
source.instructions: **Why does the `actions/` folder contain an `__init__.py` file?**

answers.answer: To make the folder a Python package so Rasa can find your actions

source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the purpose of __init__.py in the actions folder of a Rasa project
source.guidance: The `__init__.py` file makes the folder a Python package, enabling Rasa to discover and import the custom actions defined within that folder. It doesn't contain the actual action logic (which is in separate action files), action names (which are defined in each action class's name() method), or domain configuration (which is in the domain.yml file).
